医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Trametinib：阿尔茨海默病的潜在治疗游戏规则改变者研究人员开发了 ATRIVIEW® 平台来筛选促进神经干细胞 (NSC) 分化的分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Trametinib-Potential-therapeutic-game-changer-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Trametinib-Potential-therapeutic-game-changer-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a569f2e-2940-4e3d-b945-37e079cfe374 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 06:05:00 -0400 Trametinib: Potential therapeutic game-changer for Alzheimer's disease
研究揭示了 CHD8 基因、肠道异常和自闭症相关行为之间的联系CHD 基因与自闭症相关胃肠道 (GI) 表现之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-reveals-link- Between-CHD8-gene-gut-abnormalities-and-autism-lated-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-reveals-link- Between-CHD8-gene-gut-abnormalities-and-autism-lated-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae4cc831-0dee-4fb1-92dc-6b47ab32b976 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 05:32:00 -0400 Study reveals link between CHD8 gene, gut abnormalities, and autism-related behaviors
人绒毛膜促性腺激素补充剂可以促进阴茎生长吗？人绒毛膜促性腺激素是否可以加速白膜重建以帮助阴茎发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Can- human-chorionic-gonadotropin-supplements-enhance-penile-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Can- human-chorionic-gonadotropin-supplements-enhance-penile-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=070a6bc0-4d3d-4f0f-bf8c-8d14c725b576 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 04:48:00 -0400 Can human chorionic gonadotropin supplements enhance penile growth?
揭示星形胶质细胞衍生的 LCN2 在神经退行性疾病进展中的作用研究人员回顾了星形胶质细胞来源的脂质运载蛋白 2 (LCN-2) 神经退行性影响的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Unveiling-the-role-of-astrulate-driven-LCN2-in-neurodogenic-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Unveiling-the-role-of-astrulate-driven-LCN2-in-neurodogenic-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd1bd942-8b13-4c57-8f70-93b51a886e7b Wed, 04 Oct 2023 04:09:00 -0400 Unveiling the role of astrocyte-derived LCN2 in neurodegenerative disease progression
海尔生物医学推出革命性的TwinCool变频超低温冰箱​​​​​​​海尔生物医学很高兴地宣布推出适用于制药、临床研究和公共卫生实验室的新型节能TwinCool变频超低温冰箱系列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Haier-Biomedical-introduces-revolutionary-TwinCool-Frequency-Conversion-ULT-Freezers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Haier-Biomedical-introduces-revolutionary-TwinCool-Frequency-Conversion-ULT-Freezers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f62e763-2b91-4387-b469-9717353e8377 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 02:11:00 -0400 Haier Biomedical introduces revolutionary TwinCool Frequency Conversion ULT Freezers
粒子测量系统公司宣布收购环境监测服务 Irl。有限公司和 EMS Particle Solutions Ltd粒子测量系统公司宣布收购环境监测服务 Irl。 Limited 和 EMS Particle Solutions Ltd 及其母公司（统称为 EMS）；成立于1988年，总部位于爱尔兰都柏林。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Particle-Measuring-Systems-Inc-announces-acquisition-of-Environmental-Monitoring-Services-Irl-Limited-and-EMS-Particle-Solutions-Ltd。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Particle-Measuring-Systems-Inc-announces-acquisition-of-Environmental-Monitoring-Services-Irl-Limited-and-EMS-Particle-Solutions-Ltd。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0896643b-0d5a-459d-ae96-48ba70641abf Wed, 04 Oct 2023 02:05:00 -0400 Particle Measuring Systems, Inc. announces acquisition of Environmental Monitoring Services Irl. Limited and EMS Particle Solutions Ltd
FairJourney Biologics 选择 Sphere Fluidics 的 Cyto-Mine 系统来推进细胞系开发工作流程Sphere Fluidics 是一家开发以其专利 picodroplet 技术为基础的单细胞分析系统的公司，今天宣布 Cyto-Mine® 平台已被世界领先的端到端抗体合作伙伴 FairJourney Biologics 选择，提供涵盖抗体发现、工程和生产，以扩大其细胞系开发能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Sphere-Fluidicse28099-Cyto-Mine-system-selected-by-FairJourney-Biologics-to-advance-cell-line-development-workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Sphere-Fluidicse28099-Cyto-Mine-system-selected-by-FairJourney-Biologics-to-advance-cell-line-development-workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d3df678-4d27-407d-9860-7bdda063736d Wed, 04 Oct 2023 01:34:00 -0400
Ubiquigent 与伦敦帝国理工学院合作开发 DUB 探针，以促进临床前和临床目标参与研究Ubiquigent Limited（Ubiquigent）是一家药物发现和开发公司，利用新型去泛素酶（DUB）调节剂作为医疗需求未得到满足的领域的新疗法，今天宣布它正在支持化学生物学研究所 EPSRC 博士培训中心的一名博士生（ CDT），伦敦帝国理工学院化学生物学专业。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Ubiquigent-collaborates-with-Imperial-College-London-on-DUB-probe-discovery-to-facilitate-preclinical-and-clinical-target-engagement-研究.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Ubiquigent-collaborates-with-Imperial-College-London-on-DUB-probe-discovery-to-facilitate-preclinical-and-clinical-target-engagement-研究.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e83ba29f-8360-47ee-8deb-397049fd4f19 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 01:32:00 -0400 Ubiquigent collaborates with Imperial College London on DUB probe discovery to facilitate preclinical and clinical target engagement studies
步行和地中海饮食可能是降低痴呆风险的方法该研究探讨了 MedWalk 干预措施，提倡地中海式饮食和定期步行，以减缓没有现有障碍的老年人的认知能力下降。尽管受到 COVID-19 的干扰，但 157 名参与者的进展表明，这种植根于心理社会技术的方法可以提供基于生活方式的预防痴呆和认知能力恶化的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Walking-and-Mediterranean-diet-may-be-the-ticket-to-reducing-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Walking-and-Mediterranean-diet-may-be-the-ticket-to-reducing-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3c24901-4583-48f1-aa35-9bd6f5003c90 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 00:20:00 -0400 Walking and Mediterranean diet may be the ticket to reducing dementia risk
受章鱼启发的吸贴彻底改变了药物输送，有望实现免注射的未来科学家们开发了一种受章鱼吸盘启发的颊粘膜抽吸贴片，可增强大分子药物的全身吸收。这种创新的非侵入性给药平台已在猪和人类受试者上进行了验证，为静脉注射提供了一种潜在的替代方案，可提高药物的生物利用度和患者的依从性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Octopus-inspired-suction-patch-revolutionizes-drug-delivery-promising-an-injection-free-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Octopus-inspired-suction-patch-revolutionizes-drug-delivery-promising-an-injection-free-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaf29046-2517-4375-bd75-08227f4fe196 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 00:02:00 -0400 Octopus-inspired suction patch revolutionizes drug delivery, promising an injection-free future
